title: We hates the legacy mediaaa
author: VD
content_html:
From Sports Illustrated:


Oklahoma-Nebraska [NCAA football game] attendee Tom Brokaw, a guest of OU president David Boren, was booed by the Sooners crowd when introduced Saturday night.

They don’t hide their contempt for us. So, why should we bother? I would have loved to see the look on Brokaw’s face.
content_text:
From Sports Illustrated:
Oklahoma-Nebraska [NCAA football game] attendee Tom Brokaw, a guest of OU president David Boren, was booed by the Sooners crowd when introduced Saturday night.
They don’t hide their contempt for us.  So, why should we bother?  I would have loved to see the look on Brokaw’s face.
